# Spatial Expressions

All expressions listed are avaliable under the `.spatial` namespace.

::: spatial_polars.spatialexpr
    options:
      toc_label: "Spatial Expressions"
      members:
      - GeometryProperties
      - Measurement
      - Predicates
      - SetOperations
      - ConstructiveOperations
      - LinestringOperations
      - SpatialExpr
